Pre-Game Insights: India played a goalless draw against Mauritius in their first match under new coach Manolo Marquez
Syria's striker, Mawas, is in incredible form and will prove to be a handful for the Indian defence
India needs to level up their midfield if they are to have any chance of coming up with a much-needed win
Syria beat India 1-0 earlier this year in the AFC Asian Cup in Qatar
Others: The game is part of the Intercontinental Cup 2024
The match will be held at Gachibowli Stadium, Hyderabad
The predicted lineups for both teams are provided
